summary: This code reads the content of "test2.py", parses it using the PASTA library, stores the result in a tree structure, then dumps and prints the tree representation.

details.comment: This code reads the content of "test2.py", parses it using the PASTA library, stores the result in a tree structure, then dumps and prints the tree representation.
details.content:
c=open("test2.py","r").read()
import pasta
tree=pasta.parse(c)
c0=pasta.dump(tree)
print(c0)
